keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In some of the administration’s strongest remarks yet, Ashton B. Carter said Iraqi troops “failed to fight,” blaming them for a retreat that led to the fall of Ramadi to the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces Are Blamed in ISIS Rout
headline.main: U.S. Defense Secretary Blames Iraqi Forces for ISIS Victory in Ramadi

snippet: In some of the administration’s strongest remarks yet, Ashton B. Carter said Iraqi troops “failed to fight,” blaming them for a retreat that led to the fall of Ramadi to the Islamic State.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter blames Iraqi forces for a retreat from Ramadi, Iraq, that led to Islamic State's takeover of city, accusing army of lack of effort and will; Carter's comments represent bluntest criticism to date of Iraqi army by an American official.
